channel.title: Logging on SARE Samadou
channel.description: Recent content in Logging on SARE Samadou

item.title: Logging
item.description: Schema APP (triggering logger) -> LOGGER(Filter) ->(send LogRecord) HANDLER (Filter, Formatter) -> Appender (External system, LogManager) What is the story ? Application trigger logging ….. Details Default Handler is ConsoleHandler with INFO level Log Formatters: change the structure of the log message SimpleFormatter: HumanReadable way of depicting the log message. XMLFormatter: Write the log message to standard XML format. Logging Filter
